concept.title: Motorcycle Pre-Ride Safety Check
concept.shortdesc: How to perform a motorcycle pre-ride safety check.

conbody.p:
A pre-ride motorcycle check is an often overlooked safety procedure. The pre-ride check of your motorcycle is as important as proper riding gear and seasonal maintenance. This is not a comprehensive list, but a good starting guide for making the pre-ride check a normal routine before embarking on any ride.
Horn and Turn Signals
Kickstand
Lights
Fluid Leaks
Tires and Tire Inflation
Additional Information: Allstate Pre-Ride Check Reference
